texts.text:
Welcome to a wonderful tale, a tale of legend and exploration on unknown lands.
This legend will feature a great hero, a hero that will start it's path now...
And that hero is ... you!

That's right. YOU are the hero of this wonderful tale.
But first, tell us a bit about yourself.
For example, what is your name?
Player.Name, I see. It's an interesting name...
Well, then, now it is time to decide how to manifest your power.

What? Didn't you know?
You have a hidden power to traverse this dungeon, in your quest for Freedom.
But in order to use it you should choose a vessel to manifest it.

Now, choose how you want to manifest this power.
Select your power from the options below.
When you finish selecting your vessel, please press Z.

I see. Having chosen the manifestation of your power, you are almost ready...
Now, the last step is to see how much of your power you can actually incarnate.

For this, we will use the the Dices of Willpower.
I will present you with 4 Dices, that you will be rolling, imbuing them with your power.
By doing this, we can see the level of power you will incarnate in your class.
Now, press the button on the screen to roll the 4 Dices of Willpower.

So that's the ammount of power you will imbue to your class.
Well then, let's then distribute your power points across your stats.

Stats in this game works as follow:
-HP: Measures your durability to damage, if it reaches 0 you die.
-L is the Light attack stat, it measures the strength of your normal attack.
-H is the Heavy attack stat, it measures the strength of stronger attacks.
-S is the Special sttack stat, which measures the power of the special attacks.

Now, you will have to assign the result of each dice to your stats.
-Use Up/Down arrow to select stat.
-Use Left/Right arrow to select the result to assign.
Once you have assigned each stat, the confirm button will be enabled.

(Note: A point in HP gives you +20 on that stat).

So that's how your assignation will be. Interesting.
Now we have reached the last step of your incarnation on this world.
Choosing your Skills.

Skills are basically the moves you use to fight.
You can assign one skill to each slot (L/H/S).
The skills you can assign, depend of the amount of power you chose for each stat.

Now I'll show you the skills for the Light attack of your class.
-Use Up/Down arrow to select the skill, and press Z to select it.
You'll be shown the skill description after selecting it.
Press Confirm if you agree with it, and Cancel to choose another one.

Now I'll show you the skills for the Heavy attack of your class.
-Use Up/Down arrow to select the skill, and press Z to select it.
You'll be shown the skill description after selecting it.
Press Confirm if you agree with it, and Cancel to choose another one.

Now I'll show you the skills for the Special attack of your class.
-Use Up/Down arrow to select the skill, and press Z to select it.
You'll be shown the skill description after selecting it.
Press Confirm if you agree with it, and Cancel to choose another one.

It seems you've already finished choosing your skills.
Now your embodiment into this world is complete, and you can finally start your quest.

Your quest is as follows. You are trapped inside a forest with some weird paths.
Your mission, find the exit and return to the kingdom.
When you are ready, press the button to enter the adventure.
